description: This scholarship, established in honor of former UCO English and Humanities instructor Lorraine King Bell, recognizes a student who has demonstrated outstanding scholarly ability and has played an active role in university activities. Eligibility Requirements Enrolled in Bachelor of Arts in English, English- Creative Writing, English Education, or Master of Arts in English Junior, senior, or graduate standing Demonstrates scholarly excellence Active participation in department and University activities

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
